span.strong: The mission of Albers Elementary School and its educational program is to guide and direct the learning, growth, and development of the students. They will receive guidance toward self-esteem, acceptable attitudes and ideals, an understanding of the world about them, the basic skills which will enable them to earn a livelihood, and a respect for the rights and properties of others. The school must ascertain the students’ needs, interests, and capabilities and provide for these to the greatest degree possible. Our mission is to reach all students as we encourage attainment of excellence.
